meanings.definition: To express oneself enthusiastically or effusively.
meanings.sent1: She rhapsodized about the delicious cake she had at the party.
meanings.sent2: The poet rhapsodized about the beauty of nature in his latest work.
meanings.sent3: He rhapsodized so much about his new video game that his friends wanted to try it too.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes rhapsodized over the stunning sunset painting on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The singer rhapsodized about her love for music in every interview.

meanings.definition: To speak or write in an exaggeratedly enthusiastic manner.
meanings.sent1: The children rhapsodized about the amazing magic show they saw.
meanings.sent2: The author rhapsodized in his book review, praising the plot twists.
meanings.sent3: The chef rhapsodized about his secret recipe, claiming it could make anyone a gourmet cook.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rhapsodized through the room, infecting everyone with joy.
meanings.sent5: The actor rhapsodized about his dream role, hoping to one day play the character.
